item.title: Nigerian man promised pardon after 10 years on death row for stealing hens
item.description: The sentencing sparked an outcry in Nigeria - his family have been campaigning for his release ever since.

item.title: Missing India woman found in Pakistan returns home after 22 years
item.description: Hamida Banu was promised a job in Dubai, but says the recruitment agent instead took her to Pakistan.

item.title: Russia detains Uzbek man over general's killing in Moscow
item.description: A 29-year-old Uzbekistan citizen has been detained over the death of Kirillov and his assistant, state media says.

item.title: Injured Italian caver freed after 75-hour rescue
item.description: It is the second time explorer Ottavia Piana has been rescued from the cave system in Bergamo.

item.title: Honda and Nissan hold merger talks
item.description: In March, the two Japanese car makers agreed to explore a strategic partnership for electric vehicles.
